properties.title: The Commons Math User Guide - Special Functions

subsection.name: 5.1 Overview
subsection.p: The special functions portion of Commons-Math contains several useful functions not provided by java.lang.Math. These functions mostly serve as building blocks for other portions of Commons-Math but, as others may find them useful as stand-alone methods, these special functions were included as part of the Commons-Math public API.
